sentence.Network_en: He teed off on the selection committee in an illtempered article.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在一篇火药味很浓的文章中攻击选拔委员会.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...姓氏]丹尼。住所名称，来源于城镇名4.[爱尔兰姓氏]丹尼。盖尔语姓氏的英语形式，来源于别名，含义是“坏脾气的”(illtempered)

entry.def: If you describe someone as ill-tempered, you mean they are angry or hostile, and you may be implying that this is unreasonable.

example.ex: He sounded like an ill-tempered child...
example.tran: 他听起来像一个脾气暴躁的孩子。

example.ex: It was a day of tense and often ill-tempered debate.
example.tran: 那天的辩论紧张激烈，常常火药味十足。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
